primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: The Department of Environment and Natural Resources was established by the Northern Territory Government in September 2016. The government created the department to bring together many of the key functions that foster and protect the environment and natural resources in the Northern Territory.
primaryTopic.displayLabel: Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR)
